name: Sandcastles (Great Between, paloobi, profundity)
description:
Sometimes, you just want to sit on the beach and make castles, and watch the waves take them away.

Build in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare 51.

Team

  • @profundity Gameplay programming
  • @paloobi Audio/Sound/Music, Art, Game Producer

Tools Used:

  • Audio: GarageBand, Bfxr
  • Game Engine: Unity
  • Art: Blender, Krita

Credits:

  • Fonts: "Splash" Designed by Robert Leuschke Google Fonts
